predicate.note: Frames file for 'shovel' based on sentences in brown corpus. VerbNet class wipe_instr-10.4.2-1

roleset.name: throw out, as with a shovel

example.name: transitive
example.text: Clerks and postmasters [*ICH*-2] shoveled muck out of their offices -- those who [*T*-1] still had offices -- and wondered how [*] to move the mail [*T*-3] .
example.arg: those who [*T*-1] still had offices -> Clerks and postmasters [*ICH*-2]
